title: 20 min low priority que because of bugsplat

replies.body: At least you didn't lose 2 provisional ranked matches for Plat 1 because of a power outage. Apparently a leave game in a provisional counts as 2 games.

yeah the idea behind the low priority queue is great but is kind of silly, i got low priority the other night when the servers were messing up, took me an hour to start a game found a game picked champ went to toilet someone dodged i miss next q pop have to wait again then i get into next match get black screen so have to re log in and wait (happened twice) started playing league at 10 finished first game at midnight
